discussion_comments.comment_body:
There is a hidden BOM character at the start of the file. Removing it will prevent encoding-related issues in CI and editors.
```suggestion
<Project Sdk="Microsoft.NET.Sdk">
```

commented_code:
<Project Sdk="Microsoft.NET.Sdk">
﻿<Project Sdk="Microsoft.NET.Sdk">
  <PropertyGroup>
    <Version>1.2.0-beta.1</Version>
    <!--The ApiCompatVersion is managed automatically and should not generally be modified manually.-->
    <ApiCompatVersion>1.1.2</ApiCompatVersion>

discussion_comments.commented_code:
@@ -1,10 +1,8 @@
-<Project Sdk="Microsoft.NET.Sdk">
+﻿<Project Sdk="Microsoft.NET.Sdk">
   <PropertyGroup>
     <Version>1.2.0-beta.1</Version>
-    <!--The ApiCompatVersion is managed automatically and should not generally be modified manually.-->
-    <ApiCompatVersion>1.1.2</ApiCompatVersion>
discussion_comments.comment_body:
I believe you have met build failures about the apicompat and found out removing this would "fix" the error.
But this is only hiding the issue instead of resolving it.
Please revert this back and let the pipeline fails. We will find other ways to introduce real fixes to those errors.

discussion_comments.commented_code:
@@ -1,10 +1,8 @@
-<Project Sdk="Microsoft.NET.Sdk">
+﻿<Project Sdk="Microsoft.NET.Sdk">
   <PropertyGroup>
     <Version>1.2.0-beta.1</Version>
-    <!--The ApiCompatVersion is managed automatically and should not generally be modified manually.-->
-    <ApiCompatVersion>1.1.2</ApiCompatVersion>
